--- title: Shasta Sketchers description: --Nature Journaling Club author: RJ Cody Markelz date: 2022-09-15 categories: [art, sketching, adventure, nature, nature journal, mount shasta, shastasketchers, community, illustration, darmera] image: /images/ShastaSketchers-NatureJournaling.png --- Our first Drink and Draw event was a success! We are going to continue this once a month. Additionally, there was some interest in a [Nature Journaling Club](https://www.shastasketchers.com/nature) Meet-up. To find out more about upcoming events please visit our website at [Shasta Sketchers](https://www.shastasketchers.com/). We will start hosting outdoor sketching meet-ups in the spring of 2023.

If you like my sketches you can check out the [sketchbook section](https://www.codymarkelz.art/sketchbook) of my art [portfolio website](https://www.codymarkelz.art/) or follow me on instagram [codymarkelz](https://www.instagram.com/codymarkelz/).
